snippet: The French industrial materials company Imerys said it would pay $45.25 a share in cash for Amcol International, valuing the Illinois-based company at $1.7 billion, including the assumption of debt.
abstract: The French industrial materials company Imerys said it would pay $45.25 a share in cash for Amcol International, valuing the Illinois-based company at $1.7 billion, including the assumption of debt.

headline.main: Imerys Raises Offer for Amcol International, Again
